block.tooltip: Triggers when a channel is received

generator: _return = '\\nbot.on("channelCreate", async channel => { if (channel.guild.id != ' + data.req.body.guild + ') return; try {' + Blockly.JavaScript.statementToCode(block, 'code') + '} catch (e) { onError("' + data.req.body.guild  + '", e); } });'
